ational age
o Book for detailed sonar at 20 weeks where available (beware of the limitations of fetal ultrasound in
an obese woman)
o Do standard risk assessment
o Screen for gestational diabetes â€“ OGTT
o Identify women with pre-existing medical conditions
o Identify women with previous adverse pregnancy outcomes
o Consider fetal growth ultrasound in third trimester - repeat as needed
o Nutritional support and counselling (refer to dietician, can be at local clinic if available)
